actions.text: Amendment SA 243 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 94 - 6. Record Vote Number: 73.

Amendment SA 243 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S2915-2916, S2932; text: CR S2915) To express the sense of the Senate that the tax cuts assumed in the budget resolution should include the repeal of the 1993 increase in the income tax on Social Security benefits.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 243 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 94 - 6. Record Vote Number: 73.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 243 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 94 - 6. Record Vote Number: 73.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 243 proposed by Senator Conrad.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate that the tax cuts assumed in the budget resolution should include the repeal of the 1993 increase in the income tax on Social Security benefits.
